00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00021 #include "esptopologyreader.h"
00022 
00023 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00024 
00025 bool ESPTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string file, Topology &top)
00026 { 
00027     // cleanup topology to store new data
00028     ifstream fl;
00029     string parse_line, type, mass, tmp, virt;
00030     unsigned int white_space1, white_space2;
00031     int num_molecules;
00032     unsigned int check_name, check_name2;
00033     int *num_atoms = NULL;
00034     double box_x,box_y,box_z;
00035     bool HasMass, HasVirtual;
00036     top.Cleanup();
00037 
00038     fl.open(file.c_str());
00039     if(!fl.is_open())
00040         return false;
00041     
00042     // 'box_l' variable for box geometry
00044     getline(fl, parse_line);
00045     parse_line = ReadBlockfileLine(parse_line, "box_l");
00046     white_space1 = parse_line.find(' ');
00047     if (white_space1 != string::npos) {
00048         white_space2 = parse_line.find(' ',white_space1+1);                             
00049         if (white_space2 != string::npos) {
00050             box_x = atof(parse_line.substr(0,white_space1).c_str());
00051             box_y = atof(parse_line.substr(white_space1+1,white_space2).c_str());
00052             box_z = atof(parse_line.substr(white_space2).c_str());
00053         } else {
00054             cerr << "Error in parsing blockfile (box_l).\n";
00055             return false;                                               
00056         }
00057     } else {
00058         cerr << "Error in parsing blockfile (box_l).\n";
00059         return false;                                           
00060     }
00061     top.setBox(matrix(vec(box_x, 0, 0), vec(0, box_y, 0), vec(0, 0, box_z)));
00062     //cout << "Box geometry: " << box_x << " " << box_y << " " << box_z << endl;
00063 
00064     // 'num_molecules' tclvariable for total number of molecules
00066     getline(fl, parse_line);
00067     parse_line = ReadBlockfileLine(parse_line, "num_molecules");
00068     num_molecules = atof(parse_line.c_str());
00069     //cout << "Number of molecules: " << num_molecules << endl;         
00070 
00071     // 'num_atoms' tclvariable for list of number of atoms (for each molecule)
00073     num_atoms = (int*) calloc(num_molecules,sizeof(int));
00074     getline(fl, parse_line);
00075     parse_line = ReadBlockfileLine(parse_line, "num_atoms");
00076     for (int i=0; i<num_molecules-1;++i) {
00077         white_space1 = parse_line.find(' ');
00078         if (white_space1 != string::npos) {
00079             num_atoms[i] = atoi(parse_line.substr(0,white_space1+1).c_str());
00080             parse_line = parse_line.substr(white_space1+1);
00081         } else {
00082             cerr << "Error in parsing blockfile (num_atoms).\n";
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085     }
00086     num_atoms[num_molecules-1] = atoi(parse_line.c_str());              
00087 
00088     // 'particles' check whether mass is provided (if so, at the end)
00090     getline(fl, parse_line);
00091     // make sure we're at 'particles'
00092     check_name = parse_line.find("{particles");
00093     if (check_name == string::npos) {
00094         cerr << "Can't find particles variable in blockfile.\n";
00095         return false;
00096     }
00097     check_name  = parse_line.find("mass");
00098     check_name2 = parse_line.find("virtual");
00099     if (check_name != string::npos) {
00100         HasMass = 1;
00101         if (check_name2 != string::npos) {
00102             HasVirtual = 1;
00103             // make sure the format is correct
00104             check_name  = parse_line.find("{id type molecule mass virtual pos v}");
00105             check_name2 = parse_line.find("{id type molecule mass virtual folded_position v}");
00106         } else {
00107             HasVirtual = 0;
00108             // make sure the format is correct
00109             check_name = parse_line.find("{id type molecule mass pos v}");
00110             check_name2 = parse_line.find("{id type molecule mass folded_position v}");
00111         }
00112     } else {
00113         HasMass = 0;                            
00114         if (check_name2 != string::npos) {
00115             HasVirtual = 1;
00116             // make sure the format is correct
00117             check_name = parse_line.find("{id type molecule virtual pos v}");
00118             check_name2 = parse_line.find("{id type molecule virtual folded_position v}");
00119         } else {
00120             HasVirtual = 0;
00121             // make sure the format is correct
00122             check_name = parse_line.find("{id type molecule pos v}");
00123             check_name2 = parse_line.find("{id type molecule folded_position v}");
00124         }
00125     }
00126     if (check_name == string::npos && check_name2 == string::npos) {
00127         cerr << "Check format of particles variable in blockfile.\n"
00128             "Should be {id type molecule [mass] pos v}.\n"
00129             "Instead: " << parse_line << endl;
00130         return false;
00131     }
00132                 
00133     // At this point we're assuming the particles have been ordered wrt molecules
00134     for (int mol=0; mol<num_molecules; ++mol) {
00135         Molecule *mi = top.CreateMolecule(boost::lexical_cast<string>(mol));
00136         for (int atom=0; atom<num_atoms[mol]; ++atom) {
00137             fl >> tmp;  
00138             fl >> type;
00139             fl >> tmp;
00140             if (HasMass)
00141                 fl >> mass;
00142             else
00143                 mass = string("1.0");
00144             
00145 
00146             mi->AddBead(top.CreateBead(1, "", top.GetOrCreateBeadType(type), 0, atoi(mass.c_str()), 0),
00147                         boost::lexical_cast<string>(atom));
00148             getline(fl, parse_line);                                            
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152     // Check that we've reached the end of the 'particles' variable
00153     getline(fl, parse_line);
00154     if (parse_line != "}") {
00155         cerr << "'num_molecules' and 'num_atoms' do not correspond to "
00156             "number of particles. Check .esp file.\n";
00157         return false;                           
00158     }
00159                 
00160                 
00161     free(num_atoms);            
00162                 
00163     fl.close();
00164     
00165     cout << "WARNING: topology created from .esp file, charges aren't loaded!\n";
00166     
00167     return true;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 string ESPTopologyReader::ReadBlockfileLine(string input_line, string variable)
00172 { 
00173     unsigned int pos_openvar, pos_closevar;             
00174                 
00175     string str_find = "{" + variable;
00176                 
00177     pos_openvar = input_line.find(str_find);
00178     if (pos_openvar == string::npos) {
00179         throw runtime_error("Can't find '" + variable + "' variable in blockfile.\n");
00180     }
00181     input_line = input_line.substr(pos_openvar+variable.length()+2);
00182     pos_closevar = input_line.find('}');
00183     if (pos_closevar == string::npos) {
00184         throw runtime_error("Can't find '}' character in closing '" + variable + "' variable of the blockfile.\n");
00185     }
00186     input_line = input_line.substr(0,pos_closevar);             
00187                 
00188     return input_line;          
00189 }
